Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALECONTROL_AGEOUT_NOW_EN   (1 << 29u)

Age out now enable

#define CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALECONTROL_ALE_EN   (1 << 31u)

ALE enable

#define CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALECONTROL_AUTHMODE_EN   (1 << 1u)

MAC auhorization mode enable

#define CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALECONTROL_CLRTABLE_EN   (1 << 30u)

Clear table enable

#define CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALECONTROL_LEARN_NO_VID_EN   (1 << 7u)

Learn no VID enable

#define CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALECONTROL_OUIDENY_EN   (1 << 5u)

OUI deny enable

#define CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALECONTROL_RATELIMIT_EN   (1 << 0u)

ALE control register configuration definitions.

Enable Broadcast/Multicast rate limit

#define CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALECONTROL_RATELIMIT_TX_EN   (1 << 3u)

Tx rate limit enable

#define CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALECONTROL_VID0MODE_EN   (1 << 6u)

VID0 mode enable

#define CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALECONTROL_VLANAWARE_EN   (1 << 2u)

VLAN Aware Mode enable

#define CSL_CPSW_5GF_NUMSTATBLOCKS   2

Number of statistic blocks.

EMAC has two sub-blocks: STATSA and STATSB.

STATSA holds statistics for Host/CPU port (Switch port 0). STATSB holds statistics for MAC ports (Switch ports 1, 2).

#define CSL_CPSW_5GF_PORTMASK_PORT0_EN   (1 << 0u)

Port Mask definitions.

Port 0 Enable

#define CSL_CPSW_5GF_PORTMASK_PORT1_EN   (1 << 1u)

Port 1 Enable

#define CSL_CPSW_5GF_PORTMASK_PORT2_EN   (1 << 2u)

Port 2 Enable

#define hCpsw5gfRegs   ((CSL_Cpsw_5gfRegs *) (CSL_NETCP_CFG_REGS + 0x00090800))

Pointer to the Ethernet Switch overlay registers.

Constants for passing parameters to the functions.

Typedef Documentation

typedef CSL_CPSW_ALE_ADDRTYPE CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALE_ADDRTYPE

Defines ALE Address types.

typedef enum { ALE_ADDRTYPE_UCAST = 0, ALE_ADDRTYPE_MCAST, ALE_ADDRTYPE_OUI } CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALE_ADDRTYPE;

typedef CSL_CPSW_ALE_ENTRYTYPE CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALE_ENTRYTYPE

Defines ALE Table Entry types.

typedef enum { ALE_ENTRYTYPE_FREE = 0, ALE_ENTRYTYPE_ADDRESS, ALE_ENTRYTYPE_VLAN, ALE_ENTRYTYPE_VLANADDRESS } CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALE_ENTRYTYPE;

typedef CSL_CPSW_ALE_PORTSTATE CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALE_PORTSTATE

Defines ALE port states.

typedef enum { ALE_PORTSTATE_DISABLED = 0, ALE_PORTSTATE_BLOCKED, ALE_PORTSTATE_LEARN, ALE_PORTSTATE_FORWARD } CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALE_PORTSTATE;

typedef CSL_CPSW_ALE_UCASTTYPE CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALE_UCASTTYPE

Defines ALE Unicast types.

typedef enum { ALE_UCASTTYPE_UCAST_NOAGE = 0, ALE_UCASTTYPE_UCAST_AGENOTOUCH, ALE_UCASTTYPE_UCAST_OUI, ALE_UCASTTYPE_UCAST_AGETOUCH } CSL_CPSW_5GF_ALE_UCASTTYPE;
